scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.host:
npm run build && echo '--- TUNNEL PASSWORD (YOUR IP) ---' && curl -s https://ifconfig.me && echo '
--------------------------------' && concurrently -n server,tunnel "npm run server" "npx localtunnel --port 3000"
scripts.host:fast: npm run build && echo '--- STARTING CLOUDFLARE TUNNEL (Lower Latency) ---' && concurrently -n server,tunnel "npm run server" "npx -y cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:3000"
